files.title: Artificial life, fireflies and music production
files.slug: Firefly-synchronization is a biological phenomenon in which multiple oscillators follow a periodic cycle of flashing and rest. They oscillate.

files.title: Making music with RNNs, and visualizing it
files.slug: I'm training a Recurrent neural network on the Bach Chorale dataset in order to get some interesting musical results out of it. I'll share some details on how I trained it, and some early results.
